article.title: Status and history for egy_egyp
article.para: No known problems at this time.

history.history-entry:
[Adam Twardoch] Translated with
and
. Title: “common folk statement people law”. Article 1: “everyone be free man free woman with dignity law wisdom righteous all humankind be brotherhood”: Article 2: “everyone be subject to that which is statement for all people all man all woman all rank all status all speech all color all goddess all birthplace” / “everyone be subject to that which is statement for all king all country all land all judge ”. Article 3: “law be everyone dignity in death law be everyone free man free woman”. Article 4: “law be all slave be free man free woman law be ending trade of slave”.
